com.hci.geotagger.cache
Class CacheHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.hci.geotagger.cache.CacheHandler

public class CacheHandler
extends Object

The CacheHandler class is the main class used to handle the Geotagger Cache operations. Each activity that needs to cache records should have an instance of this class.

Author:
Paul Cushman

ACTION_OP_POSTID

public static final String ACTION_OP_POSTID
Action cache post operation type ID for operation type/value pair. The value IDs of this type/value pair is identified by the ACTION__POSTOP definitions.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_UPDATE_POSTOP

public static final String ACTION_UPDATE_POSTOP
Action cache post operation value ID for "update" operation of operation type/value pair. The typeID for this type/value pair is the ACTION_OP_POSTID type ID.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_TAGID_POSTID

public static final String ACTION_TAGID_POSTID
Action cache post operation type ID for tagID type/value pair. The value of this type/value pair is a Tag ID value (from the cache add Tag action).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_COMMENTID_POSTID

public static final String ACTION_COMMENTID_POSTID
Action cache post operation type ID for commentID type/value pair. The value of this type/value pair is a Comment ID value (from the cache add comment action).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_URL_POSTID

public static final String ACTION_URL_POSTID
Action cache post operation type ID for URL type/value pair. The value of this type/value pair is a URL value (from the cache add image action).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

actionCacheLock

private static final Object actionCacheLock

Method Detail

cleanup

public void cleanup()
This method should be called periodically to cleanup the cache. NO other database operations should take place during this. TODO: Implement me

imageExists

public boolean imageExists(String key)
This method will check if an image with the input key already exists in the image cache.

Parameters:
key - The key (URL) associated with the image, when it was cached.
Returns:
Returns true if the image is in the cache, false if not found.

add2Cache

public boolean add2Cache(String key,
                         Bitmap bm)
This method will add the input image bitmap to the image cache.

Parameters:
key - The key (URL) to associated with the cached image.
bm - The bitmap to save in the image cache
Returns:
Returns true if successfully cached, false if not

add2Cache

public String add2Cache(Bitmap bm)
This method will add the input image bitmap to the image cache and create a key to be used temporarily. This method is used when an image cannot be uploaded to the server.

Parameters:
bm - The bitmap to save in the image cache
Returns:
Returns the temporary key associated with the cached image

decodeCacheBitmap

public Bitmap decodeCacheBitmap(String key,
                                BitmapFactory.Options o)
This method will decode a cached (image) bitmap based on the input BitmapFactory options. The input key identifies the cached image.

Parameters:
key - The key associated with the cached image.
o - The bitmap options used to decode the image
Returns:
The decoded bitmap

decodeCacheBitmap

public Bitmap decodeCacheBitmap(String key)
This method will decode the specific bitmap and returns the decoded bitmap

Parameters:
key - The key that identifies the cached bitmap
Returns:
The bitmap associated with the decoded bitmap image.

addTag

public boolean addTag(com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Tag tag)
This method will add a Tag class record into the Geotagger cache

Parameters:
tag - The Tag class record to add to the cache
Returns:
Returns true if successfully added to the cache.

public ArrayList<com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Tag> getTags(int ownerID)
This method will retrieve the list of Tag records associated with a specific owner.

Parameters:
ownerID - ID of the owner
Returns:
Returns an ArrayList of Tag class objects

getAdventureTags

public ArrayList<com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Tag> getAdventureTags(long advID)
This method will retrieve the list of Tag records associated with a specific adventure ID

Parameters:
ownerID - ID of the adventure
Returns:
Returns an ArrayList of Tag class objects

deleteTag

public boolean deleteTag(long tagID)
This method will delete the cache record with the input Tag ID

Parameters:
tagID - ID of the tag to delete
Returns:
Returns true if successfully deleted.

getnextTagCacheID

public long getnextTagCacheID()
This method will return the next available Tag cache ID value. The cache ID values are used for when records cannot be added to the server database and need to be cached with a temporary ID value, until the record can be added. At that point the cache ID should be replaced with the ID from the database.

Returns:
A long integer cache ID is returned

addTagComment

public boolean addTagComment(com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Comment comment)
This method will add the input Comment class record into the Geotagger cache.

Parameters:
comment - The Comment class record to add
Returns:
Returns true if successfully added to the cache

deleteTagComment

public boolean deleteTagComment(long commentId)
This method will remove the Comment record from the Geotagger cache with the input comment ID

Parameters:
commentId - The ID of the record to delete
Returns:
Returns true if successfully removed

getTagComments

public ArrayList<com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Comment> getTagComments(long tagID)
This method will retrieve the list of Comment records that is associated with the input Tag ID.

Parameters:
tagID - The ID of the Tag
Returns:
Returns an ArrayList of the retrieved Comment class records

getnextTagCommentCacheID

public long getnextTagCommentCacheID()
This method will return the next available Comment cache ID value. The cache ID values are used for when records cannot be added to the server database and need to be cached with a temporary ID value, until the record can be added. At that point the cache ID should be replaced with the ID from the database.

Returns:
A long integer cache ID is returned

loginByName

public com.hci.geotagger.common.MyUserAccount loginByName(String name,
                                                          String password)
This method will check if the cache database contains a user account record for the user with the specified name and password. If found in the cache database then a true value is returned, other wise false is returned.

Parameters:
name - The user name of the person logging in
password - The password of the person logging in
Returns:
True if the record is found, false otherwise

loginById

public com.hci.geotagger.common.MyUserAccount loginById(int id,
                                                        String password)
This method will check if the cache database contains a user account record for the user with the specified ID and password. If found in the cache database then a true value is returned, other wise false is returned.

Parameters:
id - The ID of the person logging in
password - The password of the person logging in
Returns:
True if the record is found, false otherwise

public boolean addFriend(int uID,

uID - The account ID for the specific user.

logCacheStatus

public void logCacheStatus()
This method will log status information about the cache. Information about the size of the cache database, the image files in the cache, and the size of the cached files.

cacheAction

public boolean cacheAction(String url,
                           String action)
This method will add the input action to the Action Cache.

Parameters:
action - The string representing the database action.
Returns:
Return true if the action was added, otherwise false

cacheAction

public boolean cacheAction(String url,
                           List<NameValuePair> params)
This method will add the input action, represented by the list of NameValuePair objects, to the Action Cache.

Parameters:
params - The list of NameValuePair object representing the db operation.
Returns:
Return true if the action was added, otherwise false

cacheAction

public boolean cacheAction(String url,
                           List<NameValuePair> params,
                           List<NameValuePair> postParams)
This method will put the Action in the action cache, including the post operations.

Parameters:
url - The URL associated with the database operation
params - The params used to perform the database operation
postParams - The params used to perform the post db operation
Returns:
Returns true if the action was cached successfully

printCachedActions

public void printCachedActions()
This is a diagnostic method to print out the list of currently cached action records.

performCachedActions

public boolean performCachedActions()
This method is a TEMPORARY version for testing purposes. For now, this method will print out the list of cached actions. If the network is NOT up then a false value will be returned. If the network is up then a true value will be returned.

Returns:
Returns true if network is up, false if network is down

TODOperformCachedActions

public boolean TODOperformCachedActions()
This method will perform any cached actions against the database. If there are actions cached, this method will perform each action in sequence, and the associated post action operations. When an action has been performed it will be removed from the cache. TODO: Complete implementation and testing of this function

Returns:
Returns false if network is down or cannot finish cached actions

performPostOp

private boolean performPostOp(CacheAction action,
                              JSONObject json)
This private method will perform the cached action's post action operations. Should have the following name/value pairs: ACTION_OP_POSTID, {ACTION_UPDATE_POSTOP | ???} ACTION_TAGID_POSTID, or ACTION_COMMENTID_POSTID, or ACTION_URL_POSTID,

Parameters:
action - The CacheAction object associated with this cached action
json - The JSON response received from the server
Returns:
Return true if successfully performed, otherwise false
